data.title: Climate & Weather Averages in Llano, Texas, USA
data.meta_description: Climate data and weather averages in Llano
data.text:
Currently: 36 °C. Sunny. (Weather station: Fort Hood / Gray U. S. Army Airfield, USA). See more current weather

Annual Weather Averages in Lampasas, Lampasas Airport

Lampasas, Lampasas Airport is 60 kilometers from Llano, so the actual climate in Llano can vary a bit.

Based on weather reports collected during 1992–2021.
